news.title: IMF forecasts U.S. fiscal deficit will dip in 2025 thanks to higher tariff revenue
news.summary: The 191-nation fund credited higher tariff revenue for a somewhat smaller deficit projection. The 191- nation fund credits higher tariff revenues for a smaller deficit projections.

news.title: Boeing to seek FAA approval this year to increase 737 Max production as losses narrow
news.summary: Boeing's first quarter loss narrowed to $31 million in the first quarter. The company burned less cash than analysts estimated. Boeing's quarterly profit was $1.2 billion.

news.title: Why cable companies like Comcast and Charter are leaning into mobile service
news.summary: Cable giants like Comcast and Charter jumped into the mobile business a decade ago. Less than a decade later, the segment has become a significant financial driver.

news.title: Eli Lilly sues four telehealth sites selling compounded Zepbound, Mounjaro
news.summary: Eli Lilly & Co. is suing four telehealth companies selling compounded versions of its drugs. The drugs include weight-loss drug Zepbound and its diabetes drug Mounjaro.

news.title: Bessent says he expects 'de-escalation' in U.S.-China tariff fight in the 'very near future'
news.summary: Stocks soar on news of the remarks from Trump Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent. Stocks, already recovering from the prior day's sell-off, soared higher.

news.title: SAP extends lead as Europe’s most valuable company after  earnings beat
news.summary: SAP extended its lead as Europe’s most valuable company after the business-software company's stock saw its best surge in six years.

news.title: The buying opportunity of a lifetime is coming. But not before a 40% drop for the S&P 500, says this strategist.
news.summary: Thomas Kee argues that the S&P 500 is far from being fairly valued. The process of correcting that is finally getting under way.

news.title: Boeing sees commercial airplane revenue surge, even after tariff announcements
news.summary: Boeing's losses narrow much more than expected, and revenue rose for the first time in over a year. Boeing’s stock jumps, as losses surprisingly narrow.

news.title: AI data center buildups are boosting Vertiv’s sales. Its stock is rallying.
news.summary: Vertiv wants components made in Mexico to be exempt under the 2018 USMCA free-trade agreement. Vertiv said it’s working to mitigate any tariff impact.

news.title: Elon Musk is recommitting to Tesla, but will that save the stock? It’s not so simple.
news.summary: Tesla's stock is rising as investors cheer Musk's renewed focus on the company. But there are various challenges ahead, including tariffs, an evolving EV market and a history of delays.
